https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/539aWeHrqkbaUz2Dw4m07zBARhU.jpg Looking for a fresh angle to her book on relationships, Merry heads to snow-covered Vermont. She finds a new perspective and Christmas cheer with charismatic aid worker Chris. 'Tis the Season to be Merry
